ns:hibernate.statement: SELECT ETL_DATE AS ELDT, INDEX_NUM AS IXNM, CRCY_CD AS CYCD, INDEX_FREQ AS IXFQ, BRCH_NO AS BRCH, INDEX_VAL AS IXVL, INDEX_LST_D_VAL AS IXDV, INDEX_LST_M_VAL AS IXMV, INDEX_LST_Q_VAL AS IXQV, INDEX_LST_Y_VAL AS IXYV, INDEX_LST_P_VAL AS IXPV FROM INX_KPI_VAL_TEST

SELECT TABLCD, TABLNA, TABLDS, GRUPID, STATUS, ISMGTB FROM FDM_BASE_TABL tabl WHERE 1=1
AND tabl.TABLCD = #tablcd#

SELECT TABLCD , TABCOL , COLMNA , COLMDS , ISCLPK , DATATP , EDTWGT , VALDTP , DATAFM , ISSRCH , ISLIST , ISEDIT , AUTOGN , SCHCDN , CLWDTH , SHWODR , ODRMOD , VALEXP , CANEDT , COLLEN FROM FDM_BASE_FILD fild WHERE 1=1
AND fild.TABLCD = #tablcd#
ORDER BY fild.SHWODR ASC
